Class WeekDay

java.lang.Object

Serializable
public class WeekDay
extends Object
implements Serializable

$Id: WeekDay.java,v 1.12 2009/01/12 04:42:15 fortuna Exp $ Created: 19/12/2004 Defines a day of the week with a possible offset related to a MONTHLY or YEARLY occurrence.

Author:
Ben Fortuna
